quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Shawshank Redemption
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, clancy, budget. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who directed the blockbuster movie Forrest Gump?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Zemeckis

questions.question: A group of Earth children help a stranded alien botanist return home is the plot outline of this movie.

options.text: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
The Hitch Hikers Guide to the Galaxy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

questions.question: Indiana Jones from the movie of the same name could write and speak this number of languages.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 27

questions.question: What was the name of the Warden in the hit movie The Shawshank Redemption ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Samuel Norton

questions.question: Clancy Brown, who played Captain Byron Hadley in The Shawshank Redemption, appeared in a 1983 movie with actor Sean Penn.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Does Andy Dufresne escape in the movie The Shawshank Redemption?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What decade was Andy Dufresne sent to the Shawshank prison in the movie The Shawshank Redemption?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1940s

questions.question: What year did the movie The Shawshank Redemption hit the movie theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1994

questions.question: In the movie The Shawshank Redemption Andy Dufresne had a best friend in jail named Red. Why did they call him Red?

options.text: It was short for his last name.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was short for his last name.

questions.question: In the popular movie The Shawshank Redemption Andy Dufresne has a poster hanging on his wall in his jail cell. Who is the famous actress on this poster?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rita Hayworth

questions.question: What was the budget for the movie The Shawshank Redemption?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $ 25,000,000

questions.question: Andy Dufresne, the main character in the movie The Shawshank Redemption, asks Captain Byron Hadley for some suds for his fellow workers, while they are working together on the roof. What kind of beer did the prisoners get?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Strohs

questions.question: Who was the director of the hit movie The Shawshank Redemption?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Darabont

questions.question: In the movie The Shawshank Redemption, the prisoners are shown watching what movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gilda

questions.question: In the movie The Shawshank Redemption, what was Reds jail cell number?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 237

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Forrest and Forrest Gump
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, browns. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which U.S. president did Forrest NOT get to meet in person in the movie Forrest Gump?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gerald Ford

questions.question: The Forrest Gump soundtrack was hugely popular, selling over 12 million copies. Which song/artist was not on the Forrest Gump soundtrack?

options.text: Break on Through (To the Other Side) by The Doors
California Dreamin by The Mamas and the Pappas

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Satisfaction by The Rolling Stones

questions.question: In the self-titled movie, Forrest Gump appears on the Dick Cavett Show to talk about his visit to China.  Who was the other guest on the Dick Cavett Show sitting next to Forrest, wearing a U.S. Army jacket?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Lennon

questions.question: In the movie Forrest Gump, Mrs. Gump (played by Sally Field) ran a boarding house where a young Forrest taught one of the special guests how to dance. Who was this special guest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elvis Presley

questions.question: For which university did fictional character Forrest Gump play college football, earning All-American honors?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: University of Alabama

questions.question: In the movie Forrest Gump, what were the last words uttered by Pvt. Benjamin Blue to Forrest, just before he died?

options.text: Am I going to make it?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I want to go home

questions.question: What was the name of Doc Browns dog in the film Back to the Future?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Einstein

questions.question: In the movie Forrest Gump, this actor played Lt. Dan Taylor, the commanding officer of Forrest when he first arrived in Vietnam.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gary Sinise

questions.question: The movie Back to the Future, directed by Robert Zemeckis, was released in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1985

questions.question: Which 2001 movie is this audio clip from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Knights Tale

questions.question: In the movie Forrest Gump, Jenny (played by Robin Wright-Penn) and Forrest were childhood friends. As they got older, Forrest went into the U.S. Army and Jenny became a folk singer at a local strip club, using this stage name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bobbie Dylan

questions.question: In the movie Forrest Gump, Forrest joins the U.S. Army and becomes best friends with Benjamin Buford Blue (played by Mykelti Williamson). What was Benjamins nickname?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bubba

questions.question: In the opening scene of the movie Forrest Gump, Forrest is sitting on a bench waiting to catch a bus in what southern U.S. city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Savannah

questions.question: What was Forrests favorite book in the movie Forrest Gump?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Curious George

questions.question: The famous fictional character Forrest Gump wins the Congressional Medal of Honor by saving most of the men in his squad. Forrest himself is wounded during his heroic rescue. Where is Forrest wounded?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in the buttocks

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Future
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, oz, huey. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie Back to the Future, Martys actions in 1955 change the name of the mall where he and Doc meet in 1985, to secretly  test the time machine.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1955, Doc Brown, one of the lead characters in Back to the Future lives on which street?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Riverside Drive

questions.question: In the movie Back to the Future, when Marty is in the diner in 1955, he asks for what kind of drink?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: This stern lady from the movie The Wizard of Oz is Dorothys neighbour, who threatens to have her dog Toto put to sleep.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miss Almira Gulch

questions.question: In 1955, when trying to convince his teenage father George McFly to ask Lorraine out, Marty appears in a radiation suit and says his name is what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darth Vader

questions.question: In the movie The Wizard of Oz, the part of Dorothy was played by Hollywood legend Judy Garland. How old was Judy during the making of the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 16

questions.question: In the film Back to the Future, the building where the diner was located in 1955, houses what type of studio in 1985?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aerobics studio

questions.question: In the movie The Wizard of Oz, Dorothy lives with her aunt Em and her uncle whose name is what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Uncle Henry

questions.question: Doc Brown, the inventor in the movie Back to the Future, makes a time machine out of a Lamborghini.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the film Back to the Future, in 1955 Martys parents were supposed to go  a school dance, named what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Enchantment Under the Sea

questions.question: In Back to the Future, what did Goldie Wilson do in 1955, before becoming mayor?

options.text: Played in Marvin Berrys rock and roll group
Pumped gas at the filling station

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Worked in the diner

questions.question: Musician Huey Lewis appeared in the movie Back to the Future.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was the last name of Dorothy, the main character in the 1939 movie, The Wizard of Oz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gale

questions.question: In Back to the Future, Doc Brown invented this device, which in his words is what makes time travel possible.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: flux capacitor

questions.question: Where does Martys older brother work in 1985 in the movie Back to the Future?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Burger King

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Surrender Dorothy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Uncle Buck

questions.question: The dog, that appeared as Toto in the movie The Wizard of Oz, belonged to actress Judy Garland in real life as well as in the film.

questions.question: John Bender

questions.question: Chet Ripley

questions.question: Clark Wilhelm Griswold, Jr.

questions.question: The 1939 movie The Wizard of Oz is based on which novel by L. Frank Baum?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sixteen Candles and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What year did the classic movie Jaws come out in the movie theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1975

questions.question: At the beginning of the movie Jaws, a girl goes out for a swim and is eaten by the great white shark. What is the girls name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chrissy

questions.question: Sams sister Ginny is having menstrual cramps right before her wedding in Sixteen Candles. What does she take to relieve the pain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: muscle relaxants

questions.question: What is the name of the character portrayed by actor John Cusack in the hilarious movie Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bryce

questions.question: In the movie Sixteen Candles, Anthony Michael Hall plays the part of Farmer Ted. In order to show his friends that he is cool, he fabricates a story about Samantha and himself. What does he produce to his friends, to show that he was with Samantha?

options.text: A picture with Sam and himself in a photo booth

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her underwear

questions.question: In the movie Sixteen Candles, Farmer Ted ends up getting together with Jake Ryans girlfriend. They wake up in the back seat of Jakes fathers car. What kind of car is it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rolls Royce

questions.question: What year did the movie Sixteen Candles come out in the movie theatres in the United States?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1984

questions.question: What is the name of Jake Ryans girlfriend in the movie Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Caroline Mulford

questions.question: What is the name of the foreign exchange student in the classic 80s movie Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Long Duc Dong

questions.question: What actor played the part of Samanthas dad Jim Baker in Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Dooley

questions.question: Where did Samantha Baker and her family live in the film Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Illinois

questions.question: What was the name of the fishing vessel used in the attempts to catch the great white shark in the movie Jaws?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Orca

questions.question: Did actor Al Pacino turn down the lead role in the film Pretty Woman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What kind of car does Jake Ryan drive in the classic flick Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Porsche

questions.question: In the movie Sixteen Candles, Molly Ringwald played the part of Samantha Baker. What actress was originally chosen to play that part?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ally Sheedy
